title: Let's use Quarto!

This is a Quarto website to go along with the Quarto livestream at Tina Huang's lunch and learn.

## Things you can do with Quarto

- Your .ipynb files can become web pages, just by dropping them into a Quarto website folder. See  the [video-to-speech](./video-to-speech.ipynb) notebook for example.

To learn more about Quarto websites, visit <https://quarto.org/docs/websites>.
